text: The 2017 season marks Bangkok United's 11th appearance in the Thai League T1 and 5th-consecutive season in the top flight of Thai football. Brazilian Alexandré Pölking was manager for the side in his 4th season in charge. ==Game log== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width="125"|Date !width="170"|Opponents ! !Result
